thread.title: Ohio parents arrested after son, eight, ODs on heroin | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Ohio parents arrested after son, eight, ODs on heroin | Daily Mail Online

author: Jessica Chia For Dailymail.Com
title: Ohio parents arrested after son, eight, ODs on heroin | Daily Mail Online
text: Ohio parents whose eight-year-old son died of a HEROIN overdose are charged Charles Dowdy and Danielle Simko were charged with child endangerment They called 911 on January 11; Dowdy reported his son had stopped breathing The eight-year-old was taken to hospital where heroin was found in his system They also found prescription pills and bag of heroin hidden in his sock Dowdy admitted to taking drugs in the house earlier that day, and police found drugs and syringes in their home Published: 05:52 GMT, 21 February 2017 | Updated: 06:55 GMT, 21 February 2017 79 shares
